text: Belleville is a Township in Essex County, New Jersey, United States. As of the United States 2020 Census, the township population was 38,222. == References == ==Other websites== * Township of Belleville * Belleville School District * Belleville Public Library * National Center for Education Statistics data for the Belleville School District * Belleville Historical Website History of Belleville, including famous residents * Belleville, NJ History * Belleville, NJ Historical Photos Category:Townships in New Jersey Category:Essex County, New Jersey
title: Belleville, New Jersey
